arts.ttl: Mikel Arteta expects a ‘tough’ trip to Burnley
arts.sum: When I look at the big teams, the way [the promoted clubs] have behaved and how they have earned points or lost points, it’s from very small margins and that’s the reality in this league. “The game against Burnley is going to be tough.
